queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_requests"),1s) FROM "cms"."autogen"."phpfpm" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "pool"

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_requests"),1s) FROM "cms"."autogen"."phpfpm" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "pool"

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("accepted_conn"),1s) FROM "cms"."autogen"."phpfpm" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "pool"

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("requests"), 1s) AS "requests" FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("requests"), 1s) AS "requests" FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts")) - non_negative_derivative(max("handled")) FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts")) - non_negative_derivative(max("handled")) FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts"), 1s) AS "accepts", non_negative_derivative(max("handled"), 1s) AS "handled", non_negative_derivative(max("active"), 1s) AS "active" FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("accepts"), 1s) AS "accepts", non_negative_derivative(max("handled"), 1s) AS "handled", non_negative_derivative(max("active"), 1s) AS "active" FROM "cms"."autogen"."nginx" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "server"

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queries"),1s) AS "queries" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("queries"),1s) AS "queries" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_queries")) AS "slow_queries" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("slow_queries")) AS "slow_queries" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queries.query: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") - mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free")) / mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * 100 AS "mean_innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") - mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free")) / mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * 100 AS "mean_innodb_buffer_pool_pages_free" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queries.query: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * mean("innodb_page_size"))/1024/1024 AS "buffer total size" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT (mean("innodb_buffer_pool_pages_total") * mean("innodb_page_size"))/1024/1024 AS "buffer total size" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mysql" WHERE host = :host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.name: Processes

queries.query: SELECT mean("total") AS "mean_total" FROM "cms"."autogen"."processes" WHERE  host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("total") AS "mean_total" FROM "cms"."autogen"."processes" WHERE  host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `processes` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Processes plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/processes).

cells.name: CPU Usage

queries.query: SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_user") as "user", mean("usage_idle") as "idle"  FROM "cms"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: AND "cpu"='cpu-total' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("usage_system") AS "system", mean("usage_user") as "user", mean("usage_idle") as "idle"  FROM "cms"."autogen"."cpu" WHERE host = :host: and time > :dashboardTime: AND "cpu"='cpu-total' GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `cpu` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf CPU plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/cpu).

cells.name: Filesystems usage

queries.query: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used" FROM "cms"."autogen"."disk" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "path" FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("used_percent") AS "used" FROM "cms"."autogen"."disk" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:), "path" FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `disk` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Disk plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/disk).

cells.name: Swap

queries.query: SELECT mean("total") AS "total", mean("used") AS "used" FROM "cms"."autogen"."swap" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("total") AS "total", mean("used") AS "used" FROM "cms"."autogen"."swap" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host"=:host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `swap` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Swap plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/swap).

cells.name: System Load

queries.query: SELECT mean("load1") AS "mean_load1" FROM "cms"."autogen"."system" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT mean("load1") AS "mean_load1" FROM "cms"."autogen"."system" WHERE host=:host: AND time > :dashboardTime: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(previous)

cells.name: Network

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM "cms"."autogen"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "received", non_negative_derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "sent" FROM "cms"."autogen"."net" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)

cells.note: To enable this graph, you will need to configure the Telegraf `net` plugin. For more information, please visit the [Telegraf Net plugin documentation](https://github.com/influxdata/telegraf/tree/master/plugins/inputs/net/NET_README.md).

cells.name: Total Memory

queries.query: SELECT last("total")/1024/1024/1024 AS "last_total" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: FILL(null)

queryConfig.rawText: SELECT last("total")/1024/1024/1024 AS "last_total" FROM "cms"."autogen"."mem" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: FILL(null)

cells.name: System Uptime

cells.name: I/O

queries.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("read_bytes"),1s) AS "read bytes", non_negative_derivative(max("write_bytes"),1s) AS "write bytes" FROM "cms"."autogen"."diskio" WHERE time > :dashboardTime: AND "host" = :host: GROUP BY time(:interval:) FILL(null)
